title: Bracelet, one of a pair
description: one of a pair of bracelets; bracelet is loop of heavy, twisted wire; each end has a dragon head on it; dragons have a sphere in between their jaws; two curlicue whiskers on each dragon; two large antennas made from coiled wire with a sphere on the end rest on top of each dragon head
creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
